title: Windows Media Player 11 Validation Hack (wga hack)
description:
WGA is an anti-piracy system created by Microsoft, recently i wanted to install media player 11.... all the "cracked" versions i could find were infected with trojans... 
this is just a registry entry no spy ware or virus, right click and select edit to view... originally designed for service pack 2 but works just fine with service pack 3....



Comments welcomed...
